description: This file manages local storage interactions for an LMS application, including user data, lesson completion, course progress, last accessed lessons, and quiz history.

methods.name: getUser
methods.description: Retrieves the mock user object from local storage, parsing JSON data.

methods.name: setUser
methods.description: Saves the user object to local storage as a JSON string.

methods.name: signOut
methods.description: Removes the user data from local storage, effectively signing out.

methods.name: completeLesson
methods.description: Marks a specific lesson as completed in local storage.

methods.name: isLessonCompleted
methods.description: Checks if a specific lesson has been marked as completed.

methods.name: getCourseProgress
methods.description: Calculates and returns the percentage of lessons completed in a course.

methods.name: saveLastLesson
methods.description: Stores the last accessed lesson and timestamp in local storage.

methods.name: getLastLesson
methods.description: Retrieves the last accessed lesson data for a course.

methods.name: addQuizAttempt
methods.description: Appends a quiz attempt record to the quiz history in local storage.

methods.name: getQuizHistory
methods.description: Retrieves the list of all quiz attempts from local storage.
